desc.ko: 다익스트라 알고리즘, A* 알고리즘, 미로 생성을 시각화했어요.
desc.en: Visualizing Dijkstra's algorithm, A* algorithm and Maze Generation.

heading.en: Thirsty cow is looking for water!

paragraphs.ko: 다익스트라 알고리즘이나 A* 알고리즘으로 소가 물을 찾을 수 있도록 도와주세요.
paragraphs.en: You can help this poor cow with Dijkstra's algorithm or A* algorithm.

This project can grow endlessly depends on where I put my goal. Maybe I can add more algorithms, or add weighted nodes, or make algorithms to consider turns. This is a fun project and this helps me to understand software engineering basics, but for now I want to focus on frontend web development skills then solving algorithms. So maybe adding few more algorithms will be the plan.
